learn

Class DistantScaledResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • learn.DistantScaledResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRCSearchResult

    public class DistantScaledResult
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRCSearchResult
    A decorator for IRCSearchResults. It allows to scale the accuracy by a given distant.
